draftStatusHandled.description: Page level variable hold the status of handling draft statuses. The internal draft status requests will display a dialog to user for delete and recreate a new request or continue with existing draft. This variable is required to display the dialog only once on company details fragment. In the case of continue with draft this variable helps not to display dialog second time when visited company details.

@dt.label: Draft status handled flag

registrationType.description: OBSOLETE : Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based to the source of the supplier registration. The valid value is 'EXTERNAL'.

supplierTypeCode.description: Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based on the type of the supplier. The valid values are the codes of the configured supplier types.

registrationSource.description: Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based to the source of the supplier registration.

procurementBuId.description: Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based on the procurment business unit where the supplier is registering. The valid values are the IDs of the configured procurement BUs.

organizationTypeCode.description: Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based on the tax organization type of the supplier. The valid values are the codes of the configured tax organization types.

countryCode.description: Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based on the country of the supplier. The valid values are the codes of the configured countries.

businessRelationshipCode.description: Use this parameter to configure personalization rules based on the business relationship of the supplier. The valid values are 'PROSPECTIVE' and 'SPEND_AUTHORIZED'.

SupplierRegKey.description: A parameter used to identify a specific registration request and is required to execute the customActionEvent.

SessionToken.description: A parameter used to identify a specific user session of a registration request and is required to execute the customActionEvent.

submitActionEvent.description: An event initiated on the submit action of the registration request. Use this event to configure additional validations in the supplier registration flow.

companyDetailsAttachmentsSectionJourneyC.description: This property controls the display of the guided journey in the Company Details Attachments section. Set it with the guided journey code available in the journey template.

@dt.label: Set Guided Journeys Code at the Company Details Attachments Section Level

companyDetailsAttachmentsSectionTaskCode.description: This property controls the display of the guided journey tasks in the Company Details Attachments section. Set it with the task codes available in the journey template. Use the comma as separator to display many tasks. Leave it blank to render all tasks of the related guided journey.

@dt.label: Set Guided Journeys Task Codes at the Company Details Attachments Section Level
